Hours

To view Spring 2012 Library Hours in PDF, see Spring Hours 2012

Spring Term 2012
January 25, 2012 through May 28, 2012

  • McKeldin Library
    • Footnotes Café hours, see Dining @ Maryland
    • Writing Center; hours for McKeldin office, see The Department of English/The Writing Center
  • Architecture Library
  • Art Library
  • Engineering and Physical Sciences Library
  • Hornbake Library
    • Nonprint Media Services
    • Special Collections
  • Michelle Smith Performing Arts Library
  • Priddy Library (at Shady Grove campus)
  • White Memorial (Chemistry) Library

[ ] For information about each library beyond hours see UM's Eight Libraries.


McKeldin Library

REGULAR HOURS:

Monday - Thursday      8:00 am - 11:00 pm*
Friday                 8:00 am -  8:00 pm
Saturday              10:00 am -  8:00 pm
Sunday                 12 Noon - 11:00 pm*
                         
*LATE NIGHT is open 11:00pm - 8:00am,
Sunday through Thursday, Feb 5 through May 4,
except during Spring Break, Mar 18-24

EXCEPTIONS:
March
16 (Fri)               8:00 am -  5:00 pm
17 - 18 (Sat - Sun)         CLOSED
19 - 23 (Mon - Fri)    8:00 am -  5:00 pm
24 (Sat)                    CLOSED

May
18 (Fri)               8:00 am -  5:00 pm
19 (Sat)              10:00 am -  5:00 pm
20 (Sun)               12 Noon -  5:00 pm
21 - 25 (Mon - Fri)    8:00 am -  5:00 pm
26 - 28 (Sat - Mon)         CLOSED

LATE NIGHT EXTENDED HOURS: every night from
Fri night, May 4 through Fri morning, May 18
